lines.text:
[Kor disrupts Shurka's celebration]
Uh, excuse me! Excuse me, everybody! I'm sorry to break up your party, but, uh, no no no no, don't get up for my sake, OK, please don't. Who is... Shurka?

[Shurka grins as Kor approaches him]
I am. At last we meet, Kor!

[insulted, motioning to his men]
SEIZE HIM!
[Simon hugs Kor, then they clasp hands]
Rule well, Simon. Be a good king. Go on, go on back, Simon! Get some, they're waiting for ya!
[King Simon & his friends wave to cheering crowds. Kor walks off into the distance as the end credits roll]
